Facebook users flagged the story as pote: indicating that there were doubts about its authenticity.
The story originated from DuffelBlog: com, a satirical news website known for posting fake articles.
The disclaimer on DuffelBlog: com clearly states that the content is satirical and not to be taken as real news.
The photo used in the post was a composi: combining a snapshot from a blog showing flooding in 2015 and a real destroyer stationed in Japan, indicating that the image was not related to the claimed incident in Houston.
